Final Burn Alpha @pretty_version@ Final Burn Alpha is an emulator of arcade games. Currently, FB Alpha supports games on Capcom CPS-1 and CPS-2 hardware, SNK Neo-Geo hardware, Toaplan hardware, Cave hardware, Sega System 16, and various games on miscellaneous hardware. FB Alpha is based on the original FinalBurn.
